menu_items.name: Ginger & treacle cake with ice cream
Chocolate truffle chestnut torte with honeycomb
menu_items.description: A decadent torte so rich you’ll only need a little slice! This recipe makes more honeycomb than you’ll need, but leftovers will store for a week in an airtight container.

menu_items.name: Chocolate & salted caramel cake
menu_items.description: You don’t use all the caramel, but it keeps in the fridge for a few days.

menu_items.name: Strawberry & cream sandwich sponge
menu_items.description: This classic cake is, of course, named after Queen Victoria, the only monarch to reign longer than the current Queen. It’s relatively easy to make but does have a few quirks: you need to get as much air into it as possible, and be mindful of its sensitivity to variations in heat. Know your oven well and invest in an oven thermometer!
